verbose_text: Here, our analysis has revealed phosphorylated residues distal to Ser498 and our findings agree, at least in part, with radiosequencing experiments performed on the rat PTH receptor which indicated that Ser491, Ser492, Ser493, Ser495, Ser501 and Ser504 were phosphorylated in response to stimulation with PTH [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PTH receptor which indicated that Ser491, Ser492, Ser493, Ser495, Ser501 and Ser504 were phosphorylated in response to stimulation with PTH
